trans-unit.source: Specifies the display and layout information for text strings.
trans-unit.target: 指定文字字串的顯示和配置資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> when drawing and measuring text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>項列舉供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>時繪製及測量的文字。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> does not support adding tab stops to drawn text, although you can expand existing tab stops using the ExpandTabs flag.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>無法支援新增定位停駐點繪製的文字中，雖然您可以擴充現有的索引標籤可讓您停止使用 ExpandTabs 旗標。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags.ExpandTabs> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags.ExpandTabs>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼入 Windows Form 中的下列程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Call `RenderText6` from the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫`RenderText6`從表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式，傳遞`e`為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: Aligns the text on the bottom of the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 靠周框 (Bounding Rectangle) 的底部對齊文字。

trans-unit.source: Applied only when the text is a single line.
trans-unit.target: 只有在文字為單行時才套用。

trans-unit.source: Applies the default formatting, which is left-aligned.
trans-unit.target: 套用預設格式，也就是靠左對齊。

trans-unit.source: Removes the end of trimmed lines, and replaces them with an ellipsis.
trans-unit.target: 移除已修剪字行的結尾，並以省略符號取代。

trans-unit.source: Expands tab characters.
trans-unit.target: 展開定位字元。

trans-unit.source: The default number of characters per tab is eight.
trans-unit.target: 每個定位預設有八個字元。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags.WordEllipsis" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags.PathEllipsis" />, and <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags.EndEllipsis" /> values cannot be used with <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags.ExpandTabs" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags.WordEllipsis" />、<see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags.PathEllipsis" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags.EndEllipsis" /> 等值不能配合 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags.ExpandTabs" /> 使用。

trans-unit.source: Includes the font external leading in line height.
trans-unit.target: 在行高中包含字型外部前置字元。

trans-unit.source: Typically, external leading is not included in the height of a line of text.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，外部前置字元並不包含在一行文字的高度之中。

trans-unit.source: Adds padding to the bounding rectangle to accommodate overhanging glyphs.
trans-unit.target: 加入邊框距離至周框中，以容納突出的圖像。

trans-unit.source: Applies to Windows 2000 and Windows XP only:
trans-unit.target: 僅套用至 Windows 2000 和 Windows XP：

trans-unit.source: Ignores the ampersand (&) prefix character in the text.
trans-unit.target: 會忽略文字中的連字號 (&) 前置詞字元。

trans-unit.source: The letter that follows will not be underlined, but other mnemonic-prefix characters are still processed.
trans-unit.target: 後面的字母不加上底線，但仍會處理其他的助憶鍵前置詞字元。

trans-unit.source: For example, an input string of "A&bc&&d" with HidePrefix applied would result in output of "Abc&d".
trans-unit.target: 例如，輸入的字串的"(& l) bc （& s) & d"HidePrefix 套用則結果為"Abc & a"的輸出中。

trans-unit.source: Compare with NoPrefix and PrefixOnly.
trans-unit.target: 與 NoPrefix 和 PrefixOnly 相比較。

trans-unit.source: Centers the text horizontally within the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 讓文字在周框之內水平置中。

trans-unit.source: Uses the system font to calculate text metrics.
trans-unit.target: 使用系統字型，以計算文字度量資訊 (Metric)。

trans-unit.source: Aligns the text on the left side of the clipping area.
trans-unit.target: 讓文字靠裁剪區域 (Clipping Area) 的左邊對齊。

trans-unit.source: Adds padding to both sides of the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 加入邊框距離至周框的兩邊。

trans-unit.source: Has no effect on the drawn text.
trans-unit.target: 對於繪製的文字沒有影響。

trans-unit.source: Allows the overhanging parts of glyphs and unwrapped text reaching outside the formatting rectangle to show.
trans-unit.target: 允許顯示圖像的突出部分和超出格式化矩形以外的未換行文字。

trans-unit.source: Applies to Windows 98, Windows Me, Windows 2000, or Windows XP only:
trans-unit.target: 僅套用至 Windows 98、Windows Me、Windows 2000 或 Windows XP：

trans-unit.source: Prevents a line break at a double-wide character string, so that the line-breaking rule is equivalent to single-wide character strings.
trans-unit.target: 使分行規則相當於單一寬字元字串，可防止在雙寬字元字串，分行符號。

trans-unit.source: For example, NoFullWidthCharacterBreak increases the readability of icon labels in Korean windows.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，NoFullWidthCharacterBreak 會增加可讀性韓文 windows 中的圖示標籤。

trans-unit.source: This value has no effect unless WordBreak is also specified.
trans-unit.target: 除非同時指定 WordBreak，這個值會有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: Does not add padding to the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 不要加入邊框距離至周框中。

trans-unit.source: Turns off processing of prefix characters.
trans-unit.target: 關閉前置字元的處理作業。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the ampersand (&) mnemonic-prefix character is interpreted as a directive to underscore the character that follows, and the double-ampersand (&&) mnemonic-prefix characters as a directive to print a single ampersand.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，連字號 (&) 助憶鍵前置字元會解譯要為隨後之字元加底線的指示詞，而雙連字號 (&&) 助憶鍵前置字元則會解譯為要列印單一連字號的指示詞。

trans-unit.source: By specifying <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags.NoPrefix" />, this processing is turned off.
trans-unit.target: 透過指定 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags.NoPrefix" />，即可關閉此處理作業。

trans-unit.source: For example, an input string of "A&bc&&d" with <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags.NoPrefix" /> applied would result in output of "A&bc&&d".
trans-unit.target: 例如，套用 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags.NoPrefix" /> 之 "A&bc&&d" 的輸入字串會產生"A&bc&&d" 的輸出。

trans-unit.source: Compare with HidePrefix and PrefixOnly.
trans-unit.target: 與 HidePrefix 和 PrefixOnly 相比較。

trans-unit.source: Removes the center of trimmed lines and replaces it with an ellipsis.
trans-unit.target: 移除已修剪字行的中央，並以省略符號取代。

trans-unit.source: Applies to Windows 2000 or Windows XP only:
trans-unit.target: 僅套用至 Windows 2000 或 Windows XP：

trans-unit.source: Draws only an underline at the position of the character following the ampersand (&) prefix character.
trans-unit.target: 繪製加底線的連字號 (&) 前置詞字元之後的字元位置。

trans-unit.source: Does not draw any other characters in the string.
trans-unit.target: 不能在字串中繪製任何其他字元。

trans-unit.source: For example, an input string of "A&bc&&d" would result in output of " _ ".
trans-unit.target: 例如，輸入的字串"(& l) bc （& s) & d"會產生輸出中的"_"。

trans-unit.source: Compare with HidePrefix and NoPrefix.
trans-unit.target: 與 HidePrefix 和 NoPrefix 相比較。

trans-unit.source: Preserves the clipping specified by a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 保留由 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 物件指定的裁剪。

trans-unit.source: Applies only to methods receiving an <see cref="T:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext" /> that is a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />.
trans-unit.target: 僅套用於接到 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext" /> 的方法，也就是 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: Preserves the transformation specified by a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />.
trans-unit.target: 保留由 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 所指定的轉換。

trans-unit.source: Applies only to methods receiving an <see cref="T:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext" /> that is a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />.
trans-unit.target: 僅套用於接到 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext" /> 的方法，也就是 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: Aligns the text on the right side of the clipping area.
trans-unit.target: 讓文字靠裁剪區域的右邊對齊。

trans-unit.source: Displays the text from right to left.
trans-unit.target: 由右而左顯示文字。

trans-unit.source: Displays the text in a single line.
trans-unit.target: 以單行顯示文字。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the text should be formatted for display on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 指定文字必須格式化，以供在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> 控制項上顯示。

trans-unit.source: Aligns the text on the top of the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 靠周框的頂端對齊文字。

trans-unit.source: Centers the text vertically, within the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 讓文字在周框之內垂直置中。

trans-unit.source: Breaks the text at the end of a word.
trans-unit.target: 在字的結尾讓文字分行。

trans-unit.source: Trims the line to the nearest word and an ellipsis is placed at the end of a trimmed line.
trans-unit.target: 修剪字行至最接近的字，然後在已修剪的字行結尾放置省略符號。
